title: Xayah and Rakam Upon Entering the Anti-Magic Filled Demacia

replies.body: Do they turn into birds or people when they walk in
They will turn into teenagers from the middle ages. Already married with 5 children.
Is this a reference to something?
Game of Thrones, maybe? Or maybe not. I'm not in-tune with what's "hip" with the kids these days.

Neither, they just become flat out ded. Shyv finds it to be overbearing and she is only a half dragon.

I'd guess that them walking anywhere near Demacia would wake up Galio. Galio drains magic like unplugging a sink drains water.

He wouldn't need to even fight them, just stand near them and soak in the magic...

That magic may actually be exactly what he needs to permanently be able to move... More information is needed on this topic.

Because Rakam and Xayah are essentially made of magic.
Question, is anti-magic magic? Could a banshee's veil block it? Or would the banshee anti-magic be deleted by the anti-magic field? Does any of this make sense??

damn rakan in this gif is thic
Did I miss something?

clearly i have not kept up on new lore, since when was demacia anti-magic? isnt that a major flaw for lux? does noxus have a head over demacia in this matter and arent anti-magic(which could easily be a source and/or type of strength, the fucking motto of one of these places from last i remember).

Demacia rests on a huge chunk of mineral called petricide that it made it's structures out of. Anyone near them have their magic sapped from them. Demacia was built this way because their origins trace back to them being chased across the world to Demacia's current location by mages. Since then, Demacians have hated magic of any kind and even have people inside that can "remove" magic from those who wield it. This is a major element in Lux's new lore.

> since when was demacia anti-magic?

About 2 weeks ago

"There's no magic in here!"
"I tried to tell you!"
